text: Travian is a browser-based real-time strategy video game.Official presentation of Travian The aim of the game is to use the right combination of tactics to make a small village become a mighty empire, and finally build a World Wonder to level 100, which will make you the winner that round. == References == Category:2004 video games Category:Browser games Category:Multiplayer online games Category:Real-time strategy video games
title: Travian
